page.title: 13LAW & ORDER_PRESTON AREA
page.content: The area is about one tenth of the total patrolled by 3 policemen, based in Hitchin,working in shifts_with only 1 on duty at any one time. A car is essential to cover the large 'beat' and all three have a detailed know_ ledge of the local people and their property. Each man makes good use of contacts such as the village shop_ keeper to keep in touch with the news. There may be an occasional burglary or some poaching but there is very little crime to deal with. To do their job well,the policemen need to be able to work well alone, be able to take the initiative and to relate easily to the local residents.A recent innovation is the 'Police Surgery' each Saturday. A police van calls at the village for 3/4hr to answer queries and give help_ to those unable to travel to Hitchin.
